title: Is it COVID or a cold? Here's what to do if you feel sick, and how to stay safe during the holidays
author: CPR
description: I wasn't the only one at work or among my friends to experience this kind of lingering cold and COVID-19 anxiety. So I reached out to Michelle Barron, an infectious disease expert at the CU School of Medicine on the Anschutz Medical Campus, who's helped guide Colorado through the pandemic.
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
cleaned_text: In early November, I started feeling sick. I felt tired and had a really bad cough and sore throat. I thought it was COVID-19.People across Colorado and the country are once again working to understand another change to COVID-19 guidelines. CU Anschutz Fitzsimons Building 13001
